00023 #ifndef TLM_ANNOTATED_PUT_GET_IMP_HEADER
00024 #define TLM_ANNOTATED_PUT_GET_IMP_HEADER
00025 
00026 //#include "tlm_core.h"
00027 #include "tlm_h/tlm_annotated/tlm_annotated_ifs/tlm_annotated_master_slave_ifs.h"
00028 
00029 using tlm_core::tlm_put_get_imp;
00030 
00031 template< typename PUT_DATA , typename GET_DATA >
00032 class tlm_annotated_put_get_imp :
00033   private virtual tlm_annotated_put_if< PUT_DATA > ,
00034   private virtual tlm_annotated_get_peek_if< GET_DATA > ,
00035   private tlm_put_get_imp< PUT_DATA , GET_DATA > {
00036 public:
00037 
00038   tlm_annotated_put_get_imp( tlm_annotated_put_if <PUT_DATA > &put_if ,
00039                              tlm_annotated_get_peek_if< GET_DATA > &get_peek_if ) :
00040     tlm_put_get_imp<PUT_DATA,GET_DATA>( put_if , get_peek_if ) ,
00041     delayed_put_if( put_if ) , delayed_get_if( get_peek_if ) {}
00042 
00043   bool nb_put( const PUT_DATA &t , const sc_time &time ) {
00044     return delayed_put_if.nb_put( t , time );
00045   }
00046 
00047   bool nb_can_put( const sc_time &time , tlm_tag<PUT_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00048     return delayed_put_if.nb_can_put( time , t );
00049   }
00050 
00051   bool nb_get( GET_DATA &t , const sc_time &time ) {
00052     return delayed_get_if.nb_get( t , time );
00053   }
00054 
00055   bool nb_can_get( const sc_time &time , tlm_tag<GET_DATA> *t = 0 ) const {
00056     return delayed_get_if.nb_can_get( time , t );
00057   }
00058 
00059 
00060 private:
00061   tlm_annotated_nonblocking_put_if< PUT_DATA > &delayed_put_if;
00062   tlm_annotated_nonblocking_get_if<GET_DATA> &delayed_get_if;
00063 
00064 };
00065 
00066 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00067 class tlm_annotated_master_imp :
00068   private tlm_annotated_put_get_imp< REQ , RSP > ,
00069   public virtual tlm_annotated_master_if< REQ , RSP >
00070 {
00071 public:
00072 
00073   tlm_annotated_master_imp( tlm_annotated_put_if<REQ> &req ,
00074                             tlm_annotated_get_peek_if<RSP> &rsp ) :
00075     tlm_annotated_put_get_imp<REQ,RSP>( req , rsp ) {}
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00080 class tlm_annotated_slave_imp :
00081   private tlm_annotated_put_get_imp< RSP , REQ > ,
00082   public virtual tlm_annotated_slave_if< REQ , RSP >
00083 {
00084 public:
00085 
00086   tlm_annotated_slave_imp( tlm_annotated_get_peek_if<REQ> &req ,
00087                            tlm_annotated_put_if<RSP> &rsp ) :
00088     tlm_annotated_put_get_imp<RSP,REQ>( rsp , req ) {}
00089 
00090 };
